Description.Text: The Wine Spa at the Hotel Golf Peralada offers visitors a wide range of facial and body treatments based on wine and other grape by-products, plus an aqua zone, which will provide you with a pleasant sense of well-being and relaxation. There is also a heated indoor swimming-pool, gym, sports, hairdresser and a line of exclusive cosmetics. The Hotel Golf Peralada is an exceptional place for weddings and social events. Its exquisite natural setting, surrounded by the golf course edged with lakes, water-banks, trees and water birds, exudes pleasure.

Established in 2001 and renovated in 2005, this air-conditioned golf hotel includes 2 floors with 2 large suites and 53 luxurious room with a stunning view of the golf course. The hotel is part of a resort, which is located close to Castillo de Peralada castle, with its prestigious casino, the castle museum with a library including over 80,000 books and with 1001 copies of Don Quijote, the Glass Museum, the Wine museum, the Castillo Perelada winery (DO Ampurd√°n) and the Castell de Peralada Music Festival. The lobby offers its guests a 24-hour reception, a safe, a cloakroom and lift access. Further facilities include a newspaper stand, a hairdresser, various shops, a bar, a games room, large lounges with natural sunlight and a stunning view as well as 2 restaurants with local and Mediterranean cuisine. In addition, there is a large first class conference area, fitted with the latest digital technology and video conference system, with a capacity of up to 350 persons and with a guarantee of all comforts, important for working sessions, as well as Internet access and a WLAN access point (added fees apply). There is also a launderette, a bicycle cellar, a car park, a garage, a kids club and a playground (some of which incur an added fee).
